description:
What do business leaders like Richard Branson, Marissa Mayer and Elon Mush all have in common? It's not just that they lead some of the most innovative companies on the planet - they also have massive personal followings and have built a direct one-to-many connection with millions of their customers using social media.

Richard Branson, founder of global innovation powerhouse, Virgin, has more than 6.5 million followers. Elon Musk, darling of the internet and founder of SpaceX and Tesla Motors has direct connection to 2.6 million Twitter followers. Their "personal brand" means that they can speak directly to their audiences, customers, partners and stakeholders.

And you can too.

In this course, I show you how to "Tweet like Branson". Together, we will:

  • Create your professional and polished online profile
  • Learn the seven secret styles of Tweets
  • Use analytics data to improve your Twitter performances
  • Select technologies that help you get maximum value from a small investment of your time.
title: Mastering Twitter for Business Executives
